reviewText: THIS VIDEO IS AWESOME!!! EVEN THOUGH FRIEZA AND GOKU ALONG WITH THE REST OF THE GANG ARE AROUND, THE MAIN REASON ITS EXCELLENT IS BECAUSE OF ZARBON AND DODORIA!!!!!! THESE TWO CHARACTERS ARE THE BEST EVER!!!!! ANYONE WHO LIKES VILLAINS AND IS INTO DRAGONBALL Z HAS TO GET THIS ONE!!!!!!!!!!! ZARBON AND DODORIA ARE THE BEST. THE ONLY BAD THING ABOUT THIS DVD IS VEGETA!! HE IS AN AWFUL CHARACTER. STILL, GET THIS DVD BECAUSE OF ZARBON AND DODORIA. YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED!!!!!!!!
If you are a Dragonball Z Fan-GET THIS MOVIE!  The battle scenes were spectacular and so was the animation, the sound was good and so was the plot. GET THIS MOVIE!
